instructions: Image titled View Who Is Connected to Your Hotspot on Android Step 1 1 Create a mobile hotspot on your device . Image titled View Who Is Connected to Your Hotspot on Android Step 2 2 Swipe down from the top of the screen. Image titled View Who Is Connected to Your Hotspot on Android Step 3 3 Tap . Image titled View Who Is Connected to Your Hotspot on Android Step 4 4 Scroll down and review the connected users. The connected devices and their MAC addresses will be listed under the "Connected users" section. To block a device from your HotSpot, tap BLOCK next to the device you want to prevent from using your device's data connection. Advertisement
